"A.D.2028/4/21/18:30": "I tried to destroy this place! I tried to destroy the place where we belong!"
"I wonder why... I didn't want to do such a thing, but I thought you wouldn't return unless I did, and... and..."
"...But we protected it. Because Kohri helped me, we were able to protect our place."
"That's not polite. Laying hands on another doctor's patient like that..."
"Stop it! Don't... come inside of me!"
"No... no, no, no, no! Stop! Stop it! I don't want to... fight with Hitsugi!"
"...but I guess it can't be helped. I'm doing it for Mother, after all."
"I have to kill <%me> and Hitsugi, or Hitsugi won't come back... and Mother won't be happy either... Hahaha."
"So then, please die, Hitsugi! Hitsugi, you'll return to me if you die, right?!"
"Just how much... do we have to suffer... you bastards?!"
